entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add dot product intrinsics to AVX10v2 API #110032
  • SseFormatter internal buffer doesn't grow properly and throws #110028
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add CollectionMarshal.AsSpan<T>(ObservableCollection<T>) overload #110024
  • LoggerMessageAttribute and EventID inconsistency with non-code generated logging. #110021
  • Suboptimal codegen with `StartsWith(literal)` #110019
    10.0.0
  • Customizable Uri redaction for HTTP logs and traces #110018
    Future
  • Option to emit `url.template` by built-in SocketsHttpHandler tracing and metrics #110017
    Future
  • Assertion when stepping over breakpoint #110016
  • CultureInfo.TextInfo.IsRightToLeft returns false for Uyghur culture in Blazor WebAssembly #110015
  • "you must install or update .net to run this application" localization or personnalization improvements #110013
  • Allow to Specify HttpClientHandler in IHttpClientFactory #110009
  • ios-arm64 helix queue: Failed to list devices #110008
  • Regression in .NET 9.0.0 causes incorrect behavior of TypeScript Compiler running with Jurassic (System.Reflection.Emit) #110004
  • Failed to AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #110003
  • dotnet run error Assert failure(PID 28188 [0x00006e1c], Thread: 26664 [0x6828]) in .net 9 #110000
  • [iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst] String comparer for sorting numeric strings logically #109999
    10.0.0
  • OleDB has crashes and access violation exceptions when using databases in specific versions of 64 bit MSAccess #109995

Closed

  • Setting floating point control work no longer works as expected with new Exception handling in 9.0 #109997
  • Delegate constructor is reported as public by reflection API #110022
  • [API Proposal]: VPCLMULQDQ Intrinsics #95772
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] error NETSDK1147: To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: wasm-tools #109653
  • [9.0][wasm] Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 8.0.11) or (= 6.0.36) #109627
  • Hostfxr Installation Location Path Key May Diverge from Specification #109974
  • Compiler bug in release mode #109606
    8.0.x
  • > Should CA1820 be removed when all these changes defeat its perf improvement reasoning? #99219
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Missing 64-bit CPU intrinsics (e.g. pmovmskb on mm) #110005
  • AccessViolationException sometimes happens in F# compiler #110012
  • [API Proposal]: Mitigate the sources of privacy and compliance issues by providing and using safe-to-log URIs and safe-to-log exceptions #93221
    10.0.0
  • LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate Callback Does Not Work in Linux #109952
  • Update PackageValidation (APICompat) baseline version to 9.0.0 in November (.NET 9 GA) #106598
    10.0.0
  • `BenchmarksGame.SpectralNorm_3.RunBench` benchmark is much slower on Linux compared to Windows #13629
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: #110011
  • Hitting assert in NibbleMapDeleteUnlocked #109970
  • mono code line crash my server #110006
  • fail: DevToolsProxy #105881
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] problem with native linking against skiasharp and emscripten 3.1.56 #109289
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests which use SkiaSharp needs to be updated when they contain native libs built against newer emscripten #103566
    Future
  • [6.0] [tvOS] Failed to boot Apple TV: Unable to boot the Simulator #86274
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add formatting support to `System.Net.ServerSentEvents` #109294
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bound check elimination regression #109365
    10.0.0
  • [Cookie] CookieCollection.GetCookies() does not retrieve cookies prefixed with a "." #18597
  • SocketAsyncEventArgs.ConnectSocket can't be explicitly cleared #30252
  • Few non loopback networking tests fail with 503 - (Server has been shutdown) #30722

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PooledByteBufferWriter handling of sizeHint <= 0 #110031
    area-System.Net
  • Delete pragma suppression for warning disabled with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #110030
    area-System.Net
  • Adds Linux CMake presets for coreclr #110029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make contracts tests use mock/placeholder target instead of actual target #110027
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use <sys/ucontext.h> instead of <ucontext.h> #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #110007
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation on EventSource #110001
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Remove unsupported _AggressiveAttributeTrimming switch #109994
    needs-area-label
  • Use explicit full-path for loading MsQuic.dll on Windows #109963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #110014
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109919
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor 3-opt utilities to facilitate expansion #109982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to non-incremental servicing and update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow nibblemap deletes to be no-op #109976
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: (x u>> cns) -> [0..(x's max value >> cns)] #109900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix dataflow analysis for GetNestedType #109814
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Simplify usage of TestPlaceholderTarget in tests #109873
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #109988
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    area-System.Threading
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Add configuration variables. #109907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • Don't log from property accessors in the ILLink task. #109948
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #109918
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add option GCTrimYoungestDividerValue to tune gen0 trim divider #109863
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Small clean up in assertionprop for relops #109987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64-SVE: Fix up comments in optimizemaskconversions #109955
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • threads.h: Fix up grammar/spelling in vm/threads.h #109972
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution
